description.base: A missile of fire flies from the caster to the target, doing 6 to 12 damage plus one per caster level.  The target must be within 8 hexes of the caster.

upgrades.Fireball: With Fireball, Firebolt now explodes on impact, doing damage to all targets within 4 hexes.
upgrades.Meteor: With Meteor, a swarm of meteors descends on an area with a 5 hex radius, doing 10 to 20 damage to all hostile targets and only one third as much damage to friendly targets.
upgrades.BurningFlames: With Burning Flames, targets now catch on fire, taking 1 point per 4 caster levels of Fire damage for 2 rounds.
